name: Tackle Cat VS Robot Dog
description:
[Gamepad support] This is a simple game of one-on-one combat against powerful enemy. A ferocious robot dog has hacked your vacuum cleaner and attacked you to get its hands on your territory!

reflect missile


ambush

How to play

[Mobile]
move = Drag the left area
Jump and Tackle = move + Touch the right area

[Keyboard]
move = WASD
Jump and Tackle = move + Space or Return(Enter) or Z

[Gamepad]
move = Left Stick or keypad
Jump and Tackle = move + Xbox : A button

Change Log

Ver.1.1.0 (3/20/2022)
Mobile support
Cat health increased from 3 to 4
